title: David Meltzer - Preparing For and Executing the Different Levels of Entrepreneurship
itunes:title: David Meltzer - Preparing For and Executing the Different Levels of Entrepreneurship
description:
In a society that so often encourages people to focus inward and look out for number one, the rarest individuals are those who strive to inspire others without sacrificing themselves in the process.
 
David Meltzer continues to crush his life goal of making as many people happy as possible, and today he returns to spit some more wisdom from his experience as a speaker, author, entrepreneur and the co-founder of Sports 1 Marketing.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, David and Zach break down what it means to stay inspired and worthy of your accomplishments, building an all-star team that complements your skills, and how the universe responds when you keep your promises. Listen in for solid advice that will uplift you for days.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/preparing-for-and-executing/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://www.podcastpenthouse.com/roadmaps/
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
